identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: The Architect of Trust. Precision over decoration. Clarity over gloss.
core_principles: Fusion: Swiss Typography meets Financial Data Density.
Emotion: Calm confidence. The user should feel 'in control'.
Content: Data is the hero. Chrome is the support.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to group data, not lines.
Contrast: High contrast for readability. No low-contrast grey text.

theme_strategy.rationale: Financial and Real Estate data requires high legibility and a 'paper-like' trustworthiness. Dark mode is available for power users (Admin/Devs) but Light is default.

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Modal titles. DO NOT use Inter for headings.

data.usage: Financial figures, Dates, IDs, Status codes.

primary.name: Deep Indigo
primary.usage: Primary buttons, Active states, Brand anchor.

layout_system.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. gap-6 for grids.

page_structure.dashboard: Sidebar Navigation (Left) + Top Bar (Breadcrumbs/User) + Main Content Area (Grid).
page_structure.form_wizard: Centered Container (max-w-3xl) with Stepper Progress on top.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes for this business context.

cards.style: Flat, white background, 1px border. Header separated by border-b.
cards.interaction: Clickable cards must have a 'ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2' focus state.

inputs.style: h-10 bg-white border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

anti_patterns: NO Gradients on buttons or backgrounds. Flat colors only.
NO Center-aligned text for long descriptions. Left align always.
NO 'Trendy' blobs or organic shapes. Use rectangles and grids.
NO Default 'Blue' (blue-500). Use the specific Indigo/Slate palette.
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Extend the theme with the 'Structural Trust' palette and font families.
3. CREATE LAYOUTS: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component with a sidebar and a 'AuthLayout' for login.
4. USE SHADCN: Customize the existing shadcn components in /components/ui to match the 'rounded-md' and 'border-slate-200' style.
5. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button and input has a data-testid attribute.
